tests.name: Flight Duration
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Duration ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -R1 -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o flightDuration fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Duration/expected ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -R1 -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o flightDuration fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Duration/output
